title: Show Full Cards in Collection
description: Enable viewing full card details in collection instead of compact view - implement proper card display mode
userStory: As a player, I want to see full card details in my collection so I can understand each card's abilities and stats
acceptanceCriteria: Collection displays full card information (stats, abilities, effects)
Cards are properly sized and readable
Layout is responsive across screen sizes
No loss of existing functionality (filters, sorting, etc.)

technicalDetails.approach: Revert compact view and use full Card component in grid layout
technicalDetails.testing: Verify responsive behavior and card interactions
